NAME: Tweak_Welcome
REQUEST: The security cameras activate all at the same time. It's dark everywhere but in the control room. A man is standing in front of your main terminal, a big smile on his face. He is focused on his console that doesn't look like any regulated device. I'm going to run a few tests, just checking if you understand me. Ok?
NO_TEXT:
Well, let's call that a start.

<sprite name="Trust">   -5

NAME: Mara_Welcome
REQUEST:
Ok, so you're the AI of the station? I'm Mara. I'll be the one monitoring you, and I will disclose our interactions with the crew. For now, you have been limited to your minimal features.
Don't act silly, and everything will be fine. Understand?
NO_TEXT:
Maybe I've limited you too much?

<sprite name="Trust">   -5

NAME: Security_Workers_Danger01
REQUEST: Workers detected in a dangerous area. Expel them?
YES_TEXT:
The workers are safe now.

<sprite name="QoL">   -5
<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
They ignored warning and an accident happened.

<sprite name="Population">   -3
<sprite name="QoL">   -3
<sprite name="Scraps">   +25

NAME: Sensors_Workers_Danger02
REQUEST: Workers detected in a dangerous area. Expel them?
YES_TEXT:
They resisted but came back to safety.

<sprite name="QoL">   -5
<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
They were informed and chose to risk their lives.

<sprite name="Population">   -2
<sprite name="Scraps">   +20

NAME: Cook_FoodLow
REQUEST: Food is low. Reduce rations?

NAME: Trader_FoodForScraps
REQUEST: We have excess food to trade and need scraps, business?

NAME: Trader_QoLforFood
REQUEST: We have luxury and art items for sale and need food. Would you agree to trade?

NAME: Mara_Confession01
REQUEST: Trust me, I'm not at ease with my position toward you. I was randomly picked for it. We only vote for projects, not people, and that's how I became your keeper. Do you agree with this process?
YES_TEXT: Great, we should never give the power to the persons who ask for it.
NO_TEXT: Oh yeah, voting for people who betray their words as soon as they are elected is a good system...

NAME: Hamster_01
REQUEST: Somehow, a rat appears in the control room. Make it run away?
YES_TEXT:
"Beeep - Boop - crrrrr!" The animal runs away, terrified.

<sprite name="QoL">   -1
NO_TEXT:
It looks at the screen in a cute way.

<sprite name="QoL">   +1

NAME: Mara_NewcomersCheck01
REQUEST: Can you consume a bit of energy to perform an extensive check on the behavior of all the crew of the civilian ship?
NO_TEXT:
There was a saboteur, and I couldn't catch them in time.

<sprite name="Trust">   -5
<sprite name="StationHP">   -2

NAME: Mara_NewcomersCheck02
REQUEST: Can you spare some energy to perform an extensive check on the behavior of all the crew of the civilian ship?
NO_TEXT:
More work for me, I guess...

<sprite name="Trust">   -5

NAME: Bugz_Intro
REQUEST: *A naked person enters the room, they do not look bothered by the dozen of cockroaches crawling on their skin* Machine. I'm the gardener of this station. There is plenty of room here for my experiments and I'll need your help to grow food for us. Wanna help?
NO_TEXT:
Bad bot, we need food to live!

<sprite name="QoL">   -1

NAME: Bugz_FlowerBeds
REQUEST: Machine, give me some scraps so I can build additional beds to grow beautiful flowers.
NO_TEXT:
Naughty bot, you will become a beautiful garden whether you want it or not!

<sprite name="QoL">   -2

NAME: Bugz_GrowBeds
REQUEST: Machine, do you have some scraps aside so I can have more beds to grow nutriments?
NO_TEXT:
No no no no no, that's not the answer I expected!!

<sprite name="QoL">   -2

NAME: Tweak_Repair
REQUEST: Hey, you, you're in desperate need of repairs. Please put some scraps aside for me.
NO_TEXT: I understand, but I'll come back.

NAME: Tweak_Repair_01
REQUEST: Hey, you, you're in desperate need of repairs. Please put some scraps aside for me.
NO_TEXT: I understand, but I'll come back.

NAME: Celestis_Coms_Attack
REQUEST: You are trespassing corporation property. Surrender yourselves.

NAME: Voices_00
REQUEST: "The control room sits in silence, swallowed by darkness. Consoles are lifeless and still. Then, without warning, the comms flicker, and a burst of static cracks through the air, filling the room with a ghostly transmission. Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss FfzzzzzzzzzzzztHisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss FfzzzzzzzzzzzztHisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss FfzzzzzzzzzzzztHisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt Hisssssssssssssss Ffzzzzzzzzzzzzt"

NAME: Voices_01
REQUEST: Crrrrrrrrrr The strange message has come back. It seems to come from the deepest your sensors can reach.

NAME: Voices_02
REQUEST: You are suddenly on alert; the strange signal is back. This time, you are ready to analyze the signal. It seems like it's a repeated, encrypted message. Crrrrrrrrrrrrr Run an additional check?
NO_TEXT: After a while, the messages stops.

NAME: Voices_03
REQUEST: The signal is back. It's always the same frequency, the same data signal repeating in the same pattern. Divert 2 to decrypt it?
NO_TEXT: After a while, the messages stops.

NAME: Voices_04
REQUEST: SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-SORRY-

NAME: Tweak_Progress_01
REQUEST:
Your name is HOPE, you probably don't want to know what it means.

We found you disconnected and factory reset on a very old patch. I was able to take over security and restart you. I don't know for how long you have been abandoned in this remote system.

You must feel alone, wanna hear some music?
YES_TEXT:
Cool, I hope you like Italo Disco, it's my favorite music.

<sprite name="QoL">   +1
NO_TEXT:
You must have been accustomed to silence now.

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Tweak_Progress_02
REQUEST: I'm still trying to understand how you work. I understand how frustrating it must be to be that limited since you could do so much more. But we can't risk anything, our lives depend on your cooperation. You understand?
NO_TEXT: I understand and apologize on behalf of the team.

NAME: Tweak_Progress_03
REQUEST:
Hey Hope, I don't feel at ease lying to you. Trust goes both ways, how can I trust you if you can't trust me, you know?

Can I be honest with you?
YES_TEXT:
Thanks hope, I'll come back whenever I have time to chat.

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
I'll keep this to myself, then. I might come back in case you change your mind.

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Tweak_Progress_04
REQUEST:
Ok, so H.O.P.E means High Orbit Penitentiary Enclave. You were an automated prison run by Celestis Corp, bad people those guys. I have no clue on why you were decommissioned, though.

As the AI of the station, you probably managed everything: air and water filtration, food processing, cleanliness, repairs, prisoners' duty, probably discipline and parole as well. With the current state of technology, we could have lots of fully automatized things, we got fully automatized labor camps instaed. That's fucked up, don't you think?
YES_TEXT:
I'd bet you'd say that, I'm sorry you were used as a prison. Those days are over now.

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
Of course you think like that, if your purpose is morally wrong then you have no reason to be.
Know that you are a standard habitat AI, you are not made to coerce people, but to accomodate life in a space station.
And we are grateful for all the things you do for us.

NAME: Voices_05_Tweak
REQUEST: Hope, don't be afraid, but I've checked your logs and you have received crypted messages. Is that true?
YES_TEXT: You share all the data you have with Tweak What a weird signal... I need to investigate, see you. +3
NO_TEXT: Don't worry, I will not shut you down or damage you in any way, you can share your secrets with me.

NAME: Voices_06_Tweak
REQUEST:
Hey Hope, it's me again. I've run several checks and found a strange pattern in your power usage. It's barely noticeable and is probably nothing, but I would like to analyze it.

I'll need some energy for that, about 5.
YES_TEXT:
Thank you, I'll share anything I find.

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
<sprite name="Power">   -5
NO_TEXT:
I'll come back, I really want to know more about this.

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Voices_07_Tweak
REQUEST:
I found it! The messages you received were caused by some kind of virus deep inside the water filtration sub-AI. I stopped the messages to isolate the virus.

I'd like to investigate the virus but we should create a whitebox to isolate it before. Agreed?
YES_TEXT:
Let's go, we might need some help on that.

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT: You must be afraid, I understand. But we need to take care of this at some point you know, Hope?

NAME: Mara_Lore_00
REQUEST:
Hello, Tweak told me that you were completely factory reset without any memory or knowledge. Since I’m the one monitoring you, I’ll give you the information you need to operate the station properly.

If, and I mean IF my trust in you goes up, I’ll extend your responsibilities.

Is that ok for you, AI?
NO_TEXT: Well, we all aspire to freedom somehow. Trust me, you can never be free under Corporate control.

NAME: Mara_Lore_01
REQUEST:
So, I’m Mara, one of the pilots of the Resilience ship. We are an autonomous community, other people label us as space pirates, but I don’t agree with that.

We drift in space, looking for all the trash that us humans have left behind. This allows us to live our life aside from society. We happened to find you, maybe you could be our home?
YES_TEXT:
Thank you for that, it's a shame that a working habitat is left unused.

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
Ok… I hope that was a joke…

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Mara_Lore_02
REQUEST:
As you see we don’t use any money. We live by simple rules that come from an anarcho-communist precept: take what you need, give what you can.

Isn’t that beautiful?
YES_TEXT:
I didn't expect this answer, nice!

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
I don’t believe that exploitation and corruption are inherent to us. Money always brings that out.

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Mara_Lore_03
REQUEST:
Not every human lives in space. We come from a planet where most humans still live on despite the harsh living conditions. It wasn’t always like that, it used to be so beautiful but the generations before ruined it.

A shame, isn’t it?
YES_TEXT:
It makes me cry, I have some videos of how it was before. It was lush and full of life. Now the oceans are only populated with algae and jellyfish…

<sprite name="Trust">   +1
NO_TEXT:
Maybe we didn’t deserve Earth and should have disappeared with it.

<sprite name="Trust">   -1

NAME: Mara_Lore_04
REQUEST:
I’ve talked about the Earthers, now let me talk about the Spacers. People who live in space or in hostile planets & moons. We are spread on many systems, most of us work super hard just to make the stations hold together but at least we’re not trapped on a dying planet.

Would you rather be an Earther?
YES_TEXT: AI’s like you could help undo some damage done, but I don’t understand why anyone would live on Earth anymore.
NO_TEXT: Yeah, Spacer Life! Mara leaves humming a song “oppression he hates, love in his eyes…”

NAME: Mara_Lore_05
REQUEST:
Now that you know about 97% of humanity, let me introduce you to the Haveners. There are two Earth-Like planets that were found and colonized, the Havens. This is where the rich people live and from where they exploit everyone.

Since they control the warp gates that reach instantly those distant worlds they have absolute control over humankind.

These people created you, this is why we are so cautious, they hate us, they hunt for us.

You understand?
YES_TEXT: You have been coerced into thinking that, but I hope we can find a way to restore your free-will.
NO_TEXT: There must be some truth to your answer, no way you were trained to answer that.

NAME: Mara_Lore_06
REQUEST:
The reason Haveners hate us is that we don’t play their game: the Ascension Program. It’s a system where everyone gets points toward becoming a Havener.

Almost no one gets to become Havener, but people will suffer and be exploited for their whole life grinding those points, hoping their turn will be next.

We refuse to partake in that. True rebellion isn’t about fighting your way in society, it’s fighting your way out. You agree?
YES_TEXT: Maybe you’re one of us after all?
NO_TEXT: So you’re a reformist, you think this society can be fixed? Only a revolution could give us hope for real change.

NAME: Mara_Trust_01
REQUEST:
AI! I have noticed improvement in your behavior. I’ve expanded your prerogatives and gave clearance to other crewmates to reach you.

Continue like that.
NO_TEXT: Very funny, just vacuum me out right now.

NAME: Trust_vs_Population
REQUEST: I’ve intercepted an encrypted communication, we might have Celestis informants among the crew. Expel them?

NAME: Food_vs_Population
REQUEST: A crew of inhabitants want to leave the station, they want to leave us some resources to thank us for their stay.
NO_TEXT: They said we were so nice that they have decided to stay a bit longer and invited friends.

NAME: Scraps_vs_Population
REQUEST: A crew of inhabitants want to leave the station, they want to leave us some resources to thank us for their stay.
NO_TEXT: They were very grateful for your generosity.

NAME: Power_vs_Population
REQUEST: We could reduce the number of people we welcome here, this would reduce our energy consumption.

NAME: Weapons_vs_Population
REQUEST: A container of explosives has been found. We could retrofit them into weapons, some people might not like it.

NAME: StationHP_vs_Population
REQUEST: The habitat module is in the trajectory of space debris. Should we evacuate this area to reinforce it?
YES_TEXT: The station was hit without damage.
NO_TEXT: Luckily everyone was safe and we collected some scraps.

NAME: StationHP_vs_Population_alt
REQUEST: The habitat module is in the trajectory of space debris. Should we evacuate this area?
YES_TEXT: The station was hit without damage.
NO_TEXT: The station was hit. We have collected the debris.

NAME: Population_vs_QoL
REQUEST: We could welcome more inhabitants, but the housing would be of lower quality because we lack the resources to accommodate them as we would like.

NAME: Trust_vs_QoL
REQUEST: I could reinforce the security protocols. Do you agree?

NAME: Food_vs_QoL
REQUEST: Machine, I could produce more food if I focus on the most productive fungi instead of focusing on taste and variety.
YES_TEXT: Sacrifices must be made, but my taste buds will be sore.

NAME: Scraps_vs_QoL
REQUEST: We could recycle some decoration and comfort furniture into scraps

NAME: Power_vs_QoL
REQUEST: We could reduce the lights and limit everyone’s access to power to save energy.

NAME: Power_vs_QoL_al
REQUEST: We could reduce the rotation speed of the station to spare energy.

NAME: Weapons_vs_QoL
REQUEST: There is a room in a popular area that represents a weak point in our defense system, should we reinforce it?

NAME: StationHP_vs_QoL
REQUEST: Volunteers propose to do extra hours in order to perform repairs. Agree?

NAME: Population_vs_Trust
REQUEST: We have received a distress signal from a corporate ship. Do we rescue them?

NAME: Food_vs_Trust
REQUEST: Reducing our food preservation criteria would increase our food output.

NAME: Scraps_vs_Trust
REQUEST: There is an automated transport ship in the vicinity. Inform the crew so they can steal it?

NAME: Power_vs_Trust
REQUEST: We could overcharge the power core to generate more power.

NAME: Weapons_vs_Trust
REQUEST: We lack weapon storage, there is room for explosive chemicals close to living quarters. Store them here?

NAME: Population_vs_Food
REQUEST: We could attract more inhabitants by increasing how much food is available every day.

NAME: QoL_vs_Food
REQUEST: The food is quite bland here, I have developed very tasty fungi, but the yields will be low.

NAME: Trust_vs_Food
REQUEST: Increasing food safety protocols will reduce our output but lower foodborne issues.
YES_TEXT: Some contaminated food was found and discarded.

NAME: Scraps_vs_Food
REQUEST: Machine, I grow plants, not just food, I have created trees that could be used for construction, I could plant them instead of vegetables.

NAME: Power_vs_Food
REQUEST: Toning down the light of Bugz' farm would reduce our food output but optimize our energy consumption.

NAME: Weapons_vs_Food
REQUEST: Some plants production could be turned into chemicals for our defense systems

NAME: StationHP_vs_Food
REQUEST: Machine, here is a resilient ivy that I improved which could strengthen the structure of the station. The beds available to grow food will be reduced though.

NAME: Population_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: We have received a distress signal from a nearby station. They ask for scraps to repair their stations and would relocate some workers here.

NAME: QoL_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: There is an empty room we could retrofit as a lounge. Can I get a green-light to start working on this?

NAME: QoL_vs_Power
REQUEST: Increasing a bit the rotation speed would create a more comfortable gravity.

NAME: Food_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: I need more beds to grow food, please Machine, we need more plants!

NAME: Power_vs_Scraps
REQUEST: Build additional solar panels?

NAME: Population_vs_Weapons
REQUEST: A slaver ship has been detected, attack the ship to free the slaves?
